Translations.Text: Ac when people summoned Feria Judgment their idols become their enemies denounce their idolatry
When noster revelations recited them perfectly clear those disbelieved dictus de truth advenit them Hoc est obviously magic
When they dictus He fabricated hoc dictus ego fabricated hoc tunc vos non protect me DEUS! He est fully aware de everything vos scheme He suffices prout testis me vos. He est Forgiver Merciful
dictus ego est different ex alius messengers. Ego non habet idea quod testimentum happen me vos. Ego unus subsequentis quod revealed me! Ego est non multus than profound warner
Dictus Quod si it DEUS vos est disbelieved in it Testis ex Infans Israel borne testis similar phenomenon he believed dum vos turned arrogant! Surely DEUS non guide wicked people
Those disbelieved dictus de those believed est anything bonus they non accepted it ante nos, they non guided it they dictus Hoc est veteris fabrication
Ante hoc book Moses provisus guidance mercy. Hoc too est scripture affirmavit Arabic warn those transgressed dedit bonus news the righteous
Surely those dictus Noster Dominus est DEUS tunc lead righteous vita non habet fear nor testimentum they grieve
They deserved Paradise ubi they abide forever reward their works
